serverController

Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverController.PlayerManager

  • public class PlayerManager
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerManager()
      PlayerManager contains a list of Players and provides methods to do operations on the player objects stored in them.
